name: Imposter Syndrome (Inert)
description:
Imposter Syndrome is the feeling that you are inadequate at a new  situation despite external validation about your belonging there.

Learn More

I get imposter syndrome all when joining communities , perceiving their validation as secretly insidious.

This game is about that <3

In this game your HP is represented by masks:

  • You're fully masked up at the beginning
  • Your masks go away when bees break down walls

Try waiting to see what happens when your masks are all off and you stop feeling like the imposter...
